document.full_text: with a rush of churning water then a jolt, the karaoglanoglu ferry docks at karakoy passenger terminal on istanbul's european shore and a familiar rite begins.
document.title: istanbul's ferries survive change, charm anew
lines_and_colors: with a rush of churning water then a jolt, the karaoglanoglu ferry docks at karakoy passenger terminal on istanbul's european shore and a familiar rite begins.
